titleSection.name: Tasktop Sync for VersionOne and IBM/Rational DOORS Next Generation Integration
titleSection.shortDescription: Leverage existing requirements documentation and traceability, while adding the practice of agile project management

descriptionSection.description: Integrating VersionOne and IBM/Rational DOORS Next Generation helps you leverage your existing tool chain and reach more people. This integration helps manage overlap between tools with a two-way flow of requirements so that teams can leverage existing requirements documentation and traceability, while adding the practice of agile project management.

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.
